forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning clouds will give way to afternoon sunshine. High 17C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 59F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Thunder possible. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 59F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High near 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High near 60F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High near 60F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
